articles.title: DPRK Is Fully Ready for Dialogue and War: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Is Fully Ready for Dialogue and War: FM Spokesman
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a statement Monday denounced the U.S. and south Korea for starting the provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises defying repeated warnings of the DPRK and neighboring countries. The big exercises for aggression against the DPRK are escalating the tensions in and around the Korean Peninsula beyond a danger line, the statement said, and went on:
					Involved in the drills are U.S. troops present in south Korea and huge reinforcements from the U.S. mainland and the Pacific region along with offensive means. South Korea has already been put on a wartime posture, fanning up hysteria for war against the DPRK.
					
					The warmongering drills have been scheduled at a time when the hard-won DPRK-U.S. talks were under way reflecting the unanimous desire of the Korean people and countries around Korea for the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula. Herein lie the brigandish arrogance and sinister attempt of the U.S. 
					
					After publishing a new defense strategy in January which envisaged giving priority to Asia-Pacific region, the U.S. has extensively increased the number and intensity of the joint military exercises in south Korea. This clearly proves that the main target of the new strategy is the DPRK and countries around it. 
					
					The U.S. strategic attempt is not only to stifle the DPRK but to put its neighboring countries under military siege and contain them in a bid to realize its wild ambition for world domination which faced serious challenge.
					
					It seems that the U.S. thinks it can exploit the DPRK for carrying out its strategy for reinforcing military forces in Northeast Asia under the pretext of the situation of the Korean Peninsula. This is an insult to the DPRK. 
					
					The reckless war drills targeting the army and people of the DPRK, who are in the mourning period, amount to a grave provocation. 
					
					War has never been notified in advance. 
					
					The DPRK has long kept to the road of Songun in anticipation of the situation as now. It would be a mistake if one tries to rattle or test the DPRK by force. 
					
					The DPRK is fully ready for both dialogue and war. 
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to be aware that it would be left with no space for holding military exercises on the Korean Peninsula if it provokes the DPRK in an unlawful manner.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Lao Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Lao Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Kiettisak Keobanhdith, new Lao ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here to Attend International Meeting
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here to Attend International Meeting
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Delegations of China and Kazakhstan arrived here by air on Monday to attend the international railways meeting of Asian countries of the Organization of Railways Cooperation.
					Earlier, the delegations of Russia, Mongolia and Vietnam arrived.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation headed by First Vice Foreign Minister Kim Kye Gwan returned home on Monday after attending the DPRK-U.S. high-level talks.

articles.title: DPRK Judoka Grabs Gold Medal at Women's Judo World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Judoka Grabs Gold Medal at Women's Judo World Cup
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Judoka Sol Kyong bagged a gold medal in 70 kg-category at the 2012 Women's Judo World Cup held in Warsaw on Feb. 25 and 26.
					She beat her rivals from Tunisia, Britain and Spain in preliminaries and from south Korea in semi-finals.
					
					She trounced the judoka from Netherlands in the finals.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Indonesia, India, Germany and Tanzania between Feb. 11 and 15 on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					The secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that Kim Jong Il made great contributions to defending the world peace and justice and opposing imperialism.
					
					The President of the Indian Working Women Society for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and the chairman of the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea praised Kim Jong Il for his ideological and theoretical feats and Songun leadership feats.
					
					The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany expressed belief that the Korean people would triumphantly advance the socialist cause true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. We will positively support the Korean people's cause of national reunification, he stressed.
					
					The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups lauded Kim Jong Il as the distinguished state leader who firmly defended Korean-style socialism from all the moves of the hostile forces, turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power and ushered in a great heyday of prosperity unprecedented in the nation's history.
					
					Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars in India and Germany.
					
					Meanwhile, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Congo, South Africa, Guinea, Malaysia, Indonesia and Russia between Feb. 11 and 22.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups and articles on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Cambodian paper Pracheachon on Feb. 15 carried an article titled "Faith of Korea" with a photo of Kim Jong Il acknowledging the cheering masses from the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square. The article said that he was the peerlessly great man who performed distinguished feats for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					The Finnish paper Kansan Eeni on Feb. 17 edited an article titled "Socialist construction going on under Comrade Kim Jong Un's leadership" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un providing field guidance to the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm. The article went on:
					
					Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il while guiding all affairs of the party and the army. Through his field guidance to units of the Korean People's Army and industrial establishments he showed before the whole world his firm will to build a thriving nation and reliably defend the socialist system true to the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Indian paper Indian and World Event on Feb. 7 allotted its two whole pages to special write-ups interwoven with his photo and articles titled "People's leader", "Kim Jong Il's birthplace in Paektusan secret camp" and "Human cause of independence and Juche idea."
					
					A Senegalese paper and the Zambian paper Post on Feb. 13 dealt in detail with the loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Russian Paper
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was carried by the Russian paper Patriot in its issue No. 6.
					The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Finland
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), expounds the idea that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in defending and always glorifying President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based idea and feats of state building.
					
					A ceremony of releasing the work took place in Tampere City, Finland on Feb. 14.

articles.title: Participants in International Railways Meeting Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Participants in International Railways Meeting Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the international railways meeting of Asian countries of the Organization of Railways Cooperation on Monday visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Ryongnam Hill to pay tribute to him.
					They laid bouquets before his statue and bowed to the statue revering the President, who made immortal contributions to global independence.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Poet
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese Poet
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Vietnamese poet Nguyen Sy Thiet living in Ho Chi Minh City on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					The gift was handed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Hanoi on Feb. 18.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Il Sung from Vietnamese
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Il Sung from Vietnamese
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was presented with a gift by Vietnamese poet Nguyen Sy Thiet in Ho Chi Minh City.
					The gift was conveyed to an official of the DPRK embassy in Hanoi on February 18.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Struggle Supported by Vietnamese Vice-President
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Struggle Supported by Vietnamese Vice-President
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association headed by Kim Chang Il, DPRK ambassador to Vietnam, on Feb. 23 paid a courtesy call on Nguyen Thi Doan, vice-president of Vietnam.
					The vice-president said: I express deep condolences again over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il on behalf of the state of Vietnam.
					
					I am convinced that the Korean people will surely carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					I believe that the party and state of the DPRK will win victory in the struggle to usher in a heyday in building a thriving socialist nation in 2012, the year full of important political events including the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					I sincerely wish the Korean people greater successes in the struggle to build and defend the country and achieve the reunification of the country, rallied around Kim Jong Un.
					
					The relations between Vietnam and the DPRK are the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation personally provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and Vietnam will value them and make every possible effort to boost them.
					
					I, on behalf of the party and state of Vietnam, express sincere thanks to the party and people of the DPRK for positively supporting and encouraging Vietnam in its struggle for anti-U.S. national salvation, the reunification of the country and socialist construction.
					
					I reiterate the invariable support of the party and state of Vietnam for the just struggle of the Korean people to build socialism and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Anti-Japanese Sentiment Grows Stronger in Korea
articles.content:
Anti-Japanese Sentiment Grows Stronger in Korea
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Resentment toward Japan is growing stronger among the Koreans on the lapse of 136 years since Japan cooked up unequal "Korea-Japan Defence Provisions" ("Kanghwa Island Treaty").
					At that time, Japan caused the warship "Unyo-maru" incident for the purpose of fabricating the treaty.
					
					After illegally infiltrating by "Unyo-maru" into the waters off the Kanghwa Island of Korea in September 1875, the Japanese pirates attacked the Chojijin battery on the island and intruded into Jongsan and Yongjong islets. And they set fire to houses and robbed inhabitants of their property before being punished by Korean garrison.
					
					This notwithstanding, the Japanese invaders threatened the feudal government of Korea with artillery pieces and warships, asserting that the Korean side did a hostile act toward Japan and it should compensate for the damage of "Unyo-maru". They finally forced the feudal government to conclude the 12-point "Kanghwa Island Treaty" in February 1876.
					
					The treaty, the keynote of which called on the Korean side to open harbors for Japan and allow it to survey seas around Korea and draw marine chart, was aimed at political, economic and military occupation of Korea.
					
					Historical data on the atrocities done by the Japanese invaders at that time are on display at the National House of Class Education in Pyongyang.
					
					Yu Jong Hui, a worker of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, told KCNA that she came to get a better knowledge of the shameless and gangster-like nature of the Japanese imperialists through visit to the house.
					
					Japan should apologize and make reparation for its past crimes, she urged. 
					
					Kim Chung Guk, a soldier of the Korean People's Army, said that Japan has not yet abandoned its wild ambition for reinvasion of Korea, openly revealing the scheme to seize the Tok Islets, part of Korea's territory.
					
					"For the Korean nation's dignity and honor, we will surely force Japan to settle its crime-woven past and smash the Japanese imperialists' moves to grab the islets," he added.

articles.title: Mokran Video Company
articles.content:
Mokran Video Company
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Mokran Video Company is a leading producer of cultural media in the DPRK. Mokran means magnolia, the national flower of Korea.
					CDs produced by the company are very popular among local people. They include CDs containing children's films, feature and documentary films and other art pieces. 
					
					It also turns out various kinds of media dealing with such programs as music, sports and introduction of science and technology.
					
					Its products are well received for their good quality.
					
					The network for distributing those media has been well set up throughout the country including the capital city of Pyongyang.
					
					The Mokran Video Company has turned into a modernly-equipped producer and supplier of cultural media.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il visited the company in September last, expressing great satisfaction at the fact that a variety of quality cultural media were being mass-produced for local people.

articles.title: New Combustion Additive Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Combustion Additive Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A research group of the Central Experiment Analytical Institute of the State Academy of Sciences developed a new combustion additive which helps raise the effectiveness of combustion of all sorts of coal including high and low-caloric coal. 
					The additive is alkaline liquid of brown color. 
					
					When 0.5-1 liter of this additive is mixed with 1 ton of coal, the speed of ignition becomes 1.5 times quicker and caloric force and combustion efficiency increase 10-15% and 15-25% respectively, making it possible to save 10-25% of coal.
					
					It also raises the temperature inside a furnace 100-200 degrees centigrade.
					
					This additive can be used to ensure high productivity at industrial furnaces and boilers, including revolving, shaft and iron smelting furnaces and steam boiler with coal as their feed. 
					
					It has been introduced to the Posan Iron Works, Tanchon Magnesia Factory, Sangwon Cement Complex and some other units.

articles.title: Ancient Koreans Like Playing with Balls
articles.content:
Ancient Koreans Like Playing with Balls
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- As one of the folk games, the Korean people have liked to play with balls from ancient times.
					Typical of those ball games is Kyokgu. This game, similar to present-day tennis and ground hockey, is known to have been played from the period of Koguryo kingdom. (277 B.C.-668 A.D.)
					
					According to historical data, Kyokgu was conspicuous in national ceremonies in Koryo kingdom (918-1392). It shows that the Korean ancestors enjoyed Kyokgu very much in the period of Three Kingdoms (Koguryo, Paekje and Silla).
					
					When Yejong, 16th king (1106-1122) of Koryo, came to Sogyong (Pyongyang), a Kyokgu game was played in honor of him.
					
					It is also recorded in Sejong Silok (chronicles of King Sejong) that playing with balls was encouraged in those times.
					
					Kyokgu broke into games called Thagu and Phogu.
					
					Thagu was similar to golf and Phogu to basketball.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Censures S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Censures S. Korea-U.S. Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces finally kicked off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills defying strong domestic and foreign public protest and condemnation. 
					Hundreds of thousands of troops are poised for a war carrying nuclear war equipment. 
					
					The touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group is, indeed, a dangerous development.
					
					This year's joint military drills go beyond the purpose of the previous drills that had been staged under the pretext of "annual exercises".
					
					The drills envisage a preemptive attack on the DPRK which is still mourning the demise of the great father of the nation who devoted his all to the unity of the compatriots and the country's reunification. This further infuriates the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					The war drills are an unpardonable infringement upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK as they evidently target the DPRK which is in the mourning period.
					
					The warmongers at home and abroad are unaware of who their rival is.
					
					They are seeking to justify the war actions with a worn-out rhetoric of "provocation," but it will convince no one.
					
					The world closely sees who the provocateur is.
					
					The U.S. is the mastermind who worked out the war scenario against the DPRK and has continuously staged the military drills in and around south Korea by egging its stooges.
					
					The U.S. is also to blame for harassing peace and screwing up tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					As the U.S. launched the nuclear test war against the DPRK together with the south Korean warmongers, no one can predict the future developments of the situation which was already going out of control.
					
					A war on the Korean Peninsula will seriously affect not only the Peninsula but regional peace and security.
					
					The U.S. and the Lee group of traitors had better ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their reckless military provocations.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are fully ready to fight a war with them.
					
					The warmongers will meet destruction in the fire kindled by them if they go reckless misjudging the strong will of the Koreans to defend peace.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Dismisses Misinformation Spread by Mentally Deficient Guys
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Dismisses Misinformation Spread by Mentally Deficient Guys
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- An Internet news of south Korea again spread misinformation about the use of mobile phones in the DPRK on Feb. 23.
					It asserted mobile phone is being used as "a means for disseminating outlawed culture from outside" with its use gaining in scope.
					
					Every piece of "misinformation" under the disguise of "local source" is peppered with contents to defame the DPRK.
					
					This is nothing but cock-and-bull stories told by mentally deficient guys who know nothing about its society. 
					
					Korean-style socialism is a society centered on the popular masses which develops thanks to the positive role of the working people, its genuine master. 
					
					The desire and wishes of the people are fully reflected in the line and policies of the state in all aspects and they are implemented by dint of their creative energy, wisdom and resourcefulness.
					
					It is the consistent principle of the DPRK to handle "culture from outside" with the interests of the people as standards.
					
					The Korean people have strictly intercepted and repudiated at the doorstep anything unsound that gnaw at the sound thinking of people and hinder the genuine development of civilization of the society since the day the building of a new society started.
					
					This principle has been adhered to by the Korean people desirous of everything progressive and noble and invariably carried forward by the younger generation, main players in the future, irrespective of any period and stage of social development.
					
					The society in the DPRK has remained unfazed by any persistent political and military pressure of the hostile forces and any global economic and cultural turmoil because it has abided by the principle chosen by the people themselves generation after generation as their life and soul. 
					
					What is more ridiculous is that the misinformation dealt with young people in the DPRK.
					
					They constitute the strongest national power and powerhouse for nation-building as they have sound mentality and profound knowledge and categorically reject the "fragrant wind" sent by capitalism.
					
					Many of them volunteered to work in difficult and labor-consuming work sites by overcoming the sorrow over the loss of the father of the nation with strength and courage. Some of them died heroic deaths after saving their colleagues from the jaw of death. Society in south Korea is where material life has become deformed and spiritual and cultural life impoverished and political life reactionary under the strong influence of imperialist corrupt ideas and culture of the capitalist society which can be maintained only when the sound conscience of people is benumbed. Underwits in those societies can hardly understand the essence of the society in the DPRK and the noble spiritual world of the youth.  It is the height of folly for them to talk about the young people and other people in the DPRK.
					
					Pitiable, indeed, is the Lee group which provided a back room to hatch plots, counting on such fools.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Officials to Play Role of Engine in Their Sectors and Units
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Officials to Play Role of Engine in Their Sectors and Units
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial calls upon the officials to play the role of an engine in their sectors and units.
					The situation today when the grand march for glorifying 2012 as a year of shining victory is getting more dynamic day by day is calling upon the officials to take the lead in making a breakthrough under the uplifted red flag of the revolution, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					The destiny of party policies and successes in the respective units depend on how the officials work.
					
					When officials turn out determinedly, their units are sure to make signal progress and when they feel exhausted, part of the projects for the building of a thriving nation is bound to fail.
					
					We have a solid foundation of the self-supporting economy which leader Kim Jong Il consolidated by making a long journey of field guidance all his life and the inexhaustible mental strength of the popular masses cultivated by him. 
					
					Everything depends on the officials' ideological viewpoint and fighting spirit.
					
					The officials should prove to be ones fully equipped with Kim Jong Il's outlook on revolution and life calling for steady advance and uninterrupted struggle and to be commanding officials of revolution who guide operations and conduct political work among the masses only the way Kim Jong Il did.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' War Drills against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' War Drills against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills are scheduled from late February to late April in south Korea with more than 200 000 troops of U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet army and huge latest war hardware involved. And the biggest joint landing exercises of the U.S. and south Korean marines are set to be staged in and around Phohang in March in 23 years. The joint landing drills had been part of the Team Spirit joint military exercises.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					The drills reveal once again the warlike nature of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors intent on provoking a war against the DPRK and bringing it down by force of arms through military nexus with the U.S., the article says, and goes on:
					
					The war drills reflect the deep rooted ambition of the south Korean puppet group and its desperate attempt to escape from ruin.
					
					The Lee group plunged south Korea still deeper into the U.S. in political, military and economic dependence through matchless sycophantic and treacherous politics. It also mercilessly violated not only the democratic freedom and rights of the people but also their right to existence with fascist dictatorship.
					
					The south Korean ruling forces are being shaken to their very foundation by south Korean people's unflinching struggle to smash the sycophantic, anti-reunification and unpopular moves of the traitors and achieve the right to existence and democracy.
					
					Much upset by this, the Lee group is trying to find a way out from it in military provocation campaign against the fellow countrymen in the north. Through the military exercises the group plans to escalate tension, divert public attention and turn the "election"-related political situation in its favor by clamoring about "security crisis".
					
					But it will only bring ruin to it. The history clearly showed what a miserable fate awaited the traitors who betrayed the nation and ran reckless to stoke confrontation with the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Launch Key Resolve Drills
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea Launch Key Resolve Drills
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers Monday launched the Key Resolve joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK, defying unanimous condemnation and rejection at home and abroad. 
					The U.S. imperialist aggression troops and offensive means for preemptive nuclear attack have already been deployed in and around south Korea. The three services of the south Korean army have been put in a wartime posture.
					
					The drills with a main emphasis on the rapid movement of the reinforcements of the U.S. troops to the forefront have brought together hundreds of thousands of GIs, south Korean forces and huge war equipment. 
					
					They also activated all kinds of radars, reconnaissance planes and other monitoring means in the forefront area and put all south Korean fighters and offensive weapons including artillery pieces in the forefront combat ready.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Saber-rattling against DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Saber-rattling against DPRK Flayed
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Large-scale Key Resolve joint military exercises are due to start in south Korea Monday.
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This is an unpardonable provocation to do harm to the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and a dangerous adventure to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					The danger of the annual saber-rattling has already been brought to light but it has never assumed such provocative nature as the current exercises.
					
					The inter-Korean relations have gone to such phase of crisis that they may develop into a total war due to even a slight military action or accidental incident.
					
					Warmongers at home and abroad claim that their joint military maneuvers have nothing to do with the situation on the peninsula nor pose any threat to anyone as they are "annual drills" and "are of defensive nature." But this is nothing but a sheer lie to cover up the provocative nature of the saber-rattling and calm down domestic and foreign voices branding them as wreckers of peace.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, in fact, made a silent declaration of a war against the DPRK by kicking off Key Resolve.
					
					It was entirely just that the DPRK National Defence Commission clarified its steadfast stand to wipe out the  cursed group of aggressors bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the inviolable land and take strong self-defensive measures for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and the peace of the country.
					
					The DPRK will react against the war saber-rattling of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group with a merciless punishment.

articles.title: S. Korean Reserve Forces to Stage Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korean Reserve Forces to Stage Military Exercises
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The 56th Infantry Division belonging to the south Korean puppet Metropolitan Garrison Command announced that it would stage military exercises of the reserve troops from February 27 to March 9, according to the Yonhap News of south Korea.
					The exercises to be held in parallel with Key Resolve, big joint military exercises for invasion of the DPRK, will reportedly bring together over 55 000 reserve troops under the division with an aim to boost the integrated operational capabilities among civilians, administrative officials and the puppet army.

articles.title: S. Korean Reverend Decries Unreasonable Court Judgment on Protesters against Military Base
articles.content:
S. Korean Reverend Decries Unreasonable Court Judgment on Protesters against Military Base
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- South Korean Rev. Mun Jong Hyon decried the unreasonable judgment passed by the court on protesters against the construction of a naval base on Jeju Island.
					Mun took part in field protests against the construction of the base, a project that has been pushed forward by the authorities.
					
					Last year he joined members of the civic and public organizations of various circles and inhabitants on the island in protesting in areas around the construction site.
					
					The fascist public security forces walked off him and other protestors several times. Recently they went the lengths of indicting them on charges of the interference in the execution of the duties.
					
					The Jeju District Court held a final trial on February 24 in which it sentenced Mun and 11 others to imprisonment.
					
					As regards the legal measure of the authorities, Mun said that the construction of the military base is unlawful and it is just to denounce the construction, declaring that no one can quench their will against the construction of the naval base.

articles.title: Iran Rejects Israel's Allegations
articles.content:
Iran Rejects Israel's Allegations
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Iran called on the UN Security Council to act to stop Israel's illegal actions, covert assassinations, threats to use force and policies and terrorist practices against other nations, a media report said.
					The call was made by Iranian Ambassador at UN Mohammad Khazaee, in a letter rejecting Tel Aviv's statements on Iran's alleged involvement in recent attacks on Israeli targets in Thailand, India, Georgia and Azerbaijan.
					
					The government of the Islamic Republic of Iran reiterates that there should be no double standards in fighting terrorism, noted the text circulated at the UN headquarters in New York.

articles.title: GI Crimes Unabated in Afghanistan
articles.content:
GI Crimes Unabated in Afghanistan
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- GIs in Afghanistan committed awful crimes one after another, stunning the international community and touching off criticism from all people.
					Afghan laborers found charred remains of copies of the Koran, when collecting rubbish from a Bagram airforce base in the suburbs of Kabul on Feb. 20.
					
					This news triggered off strong anti-U.S. demonstrations in various parts of Afghanistan. The U.S. consulate was attacked and GIs were killed.  
					
					As the situation turned grave, the U.S. chief executive was busy sending apology to the president of Afghanistan.
					
					It is the second time this year that the U.S. forces in Afghanistan committed a diabolical act, stunning the world.
					
					Posted on Internet on Jan. 11 was a video showing four U.S. marines urinating on the dead bodies of three Taliban fighters and jeering "Have a nice day, buddy" and "this is shower of urine for you." This incident which touched off towering protest against the U.S. is still vivid in the memory of people.
					
					In 2011 alone gunships of the U.S. forces machine-gunned nine boys under 12 one by one when collecting firewood in Kunar Province.
					
					Five GIs committed all sorts of rash acts such as taking almost 4 000 photos showing them killing Afghans, the crime which can be committed only by human butchers.
					
					The chief criminal had a photo taken, guffawing, his face raised with the hair of the dead civilian in his hand. This photo provoked world public uproar.
					
					These crimes against ethics clearly proved what "liberty" and "human rights" for Afghanistan which the U.S. so noisily advertised are really like.

articles.title: Ayat. Khatami Condemns U.S. for Desecration of Holy Quran
articles.content:
Ayat. Khatami Condemns U.S. for Desecration of Holy Quran
Tehran, February 26 (KCNA) -- Substitute Friday prayers leader of Tehran Ayatllah Ahmad Khatami on Friday condemned the U.S. for its desecration of Holy Quran in Afghanistan's Bagram base.
					Khatami in his second Friday prayers sermon refuted the claim of U.S. officials that the U.S. forces had erroneously burnt Holy Quran copies in Afghanistan. "It was a deliberate act, stemming from the U.S. statesmen's hostility towards Islam," he said.
					
					He then referred to apology of the U.S. President Barack Obama and commander of the U.S. military base in Afghanistan on the issue, saying it is a mock apology. "I announced with a loud voice; the world should know that the U.S. government is hostile to Islam."

articles.title: Sri Lanka Calls for Public Demos against UNHRC Resolution
articles.content:
Sri Lanka Calls for Public Demos against UNHRC Resolution
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Sri Lankan government has planned public demonstrations calling on people to take to roads against any resolution to be passed at the 19th sessions of the United Nations Human Rights Council (UNHRC) on February 27, a government spokesman said on Thursday. 
					The general secretary of the ruling coalition party said that island-wide protests will be conducted in parallel to the opening of UNHRC sessions on February 27. 
					
					He also accused the United States of trying to plot against Sri Lanka and planning to bring a resolution against the island nation.    
					
					"As far as we know, the United States is making a plan against this country with the support of several western allies," the minister of Petroleum, said. 
					
					The minister of Power and Energy said this is another attempt to weaken a strong government.

articles.title: Africa Can Best Solve Its Problems: Ugandan President
articles.content:
Africa Can Best Solve Its Problems: Ugandan President
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni said in an international conference that problems in Africa can best be solved if African countries take the lead instead of foreigners, a State House statement issued on Friday said.
					"When external stake holders usurp the powers to solve African problems, failure and catastrophe is unavoidable; whereas where Africans take the lead in partnership with others, results are better," he said.
					
					Museveni who has for long protested foreign intervention in Africa said the correct way of handling African crises involves three issues, engaging internal stakeholders, respective regional efforts and international partners.

articles.title: Nasrollah: By Resistance We Demolish New Middle East Plan
articles.content:
Nasrollah: By Resistance We Demolish New Middle East Plan
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Lebanese Hezbollah Secretary General, Seyed Hassan Nasrollah, Friday vowed to demolish U.S. and Israeli plans, such as New Middle East Plan, by resistance, a media report said.
					"We protect our country and we resist against any kind of threat and problem," Nasrollah said.
					
					He continued that the Zionist regime thought has been formed upon threatening others and has always been accompanied with threat and insult to others.

articles.title: RPDC esta preparada para dialogo y guerra senala portavoz de MINREX
articles.content:
RPDC esta preparada para dialogo y guerra senala portavoz de MINREX
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 27 una declaracion que sigue:
					Debido a las imprudentes maniobras de guerra de Estados Unidos, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region periferica se torna extremadamente tensa sobrepasando otra vez la linea roja.
					
					Pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC y otros paises vecinos, EE.UU. y los titeres del Sur de Corea iniciaron por fin los ejercicios de guerra de gran envergadura con caracter provocativo y agresivo.
					
					En estas maniobras denominadas "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" participan los efectivos norteamericanos ocupantes del Sur de Corea, el personal y los medios de ataque de refuerzo provenientes del territorio norteamericano y la region del Pacifico.
					
					Toda la extension surcoreana entro ya en el estado para el tiempo de guerra fomentandose el clima a favor de la agresion armada contra la RPDC.
					
					La prepotencia de EE.UU. y lo malsano de su designio se manifiestan en que el quiere librar a toda costa esas maniobras con denso olor a polvora, justamente cuando celebran al cabo de ingentes esfuerzos las conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU. en reflejo de la unanime aspiracion del pueblo coreano y los paises vecinos a la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Despues de publicar en enero ultimo la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional enfocada en la region Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. aumenta el numero y la intensidad de los ejercicios militares conjuntos en el Sur de Corea, lo que demuestra evidentemente que su blanco principal es la RPDC y los paises del contorno.
					
					Su intento estrategico es atropellar con la fuerza a la RPDC y a la larga, cercar y disuadir militarmente a los paises vecinos para realizar su ambicion de tomar la heguemonia mundial que afronta serios desafios.
					
					Seria una ofensa para la RPDC si EE.UU. la toma como pretexto cuestionando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana en funcion de su estrategia de reforzar sus fuerzas armadas en el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Seran vistos por todos como provocacion tales ejercicios de guerra contra nuestro ejercito y pueblo que estan todavia en duelo nacional.
					
					La guerra no se hace avisandola previamente.
					
					Para hacer frente a las situaciones como la actual, hemos recorrido desde hace mucho tiempo y seguimos avanzando en el camino del Songun. Por lo tanto, seria una gran equivocacion si tratan de asustarnos o probarnos con la fuerza.
					
					Estamos preparados tanto para el dialogo como para la guerra.
					
					EE.UU. debe darse cuenta que si se atreve a atentarnos aunque en lo minimo, perderian en la Peninsula Coreana el mismo terreno donde desarrollar sus ejercicios militares en lo adelante.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidades en la zona del frente de sudoeste del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidades en la zona del frente de sudoeste del EPC
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, inspecciono las unidades adscritas a la comandancia del cuerpo no 4. del  EPC situada en la zona del frente de sudoeste.
					En primer lugar, estuvo en el batallon no. 1 y el no. 4 adscritos a la unidad 403 del EPC situada en el frente avanzado.
					
					El Comandante Supremo dio como recuerdos los binoculos y fusiles automaticos a los militares de los batallones, se fotografio con ellos y conocio en detalles del estado de preparacion de batalla recorriendo las posiciones de combate del batallon no.4.
					
					El batallon hace gala de su nombre con la batalla de la isla Yonphyong, cuando respondio con el fuego despiadado a las maniobras agresivas de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos que se atrevian a disparar canonazos hacia aguas territoriales de la RPDC.
					
					El Comandante Supremo evaluo altamente el merito de los militares quienes demostraron el poder real de las fuerzas armadas y verdadera guerra de poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.
					
					Seguidamente recorrio el cuartel y el bano de la compania adscrita atendiendo minuciosamente la vida de los militares.
					
					Al averiguar las posiciones de combate de la unidad desde el punto de vista de topografia y objetos terrestres y la preparacion de batalla dio la tarea de mover en una nueva posicion diciendo que la ubicacion actual de la unidad no es conveniente tacticamente.
					
					Presto cordial atencion a la vida de los militares recorriendo el cuartel, la sala de educacion y otros lugares de la compania adscrita al batallon no.1.
					
					Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo inspecciono el puesto de mando avanzado de la unidad 688 del EPC, donde analizo el estado de ubicacion de las fuerzas y equipos reforzados de la unidad de defensa de la isla Yonphyong del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Conocio detalladamente de la topografia y objetos terrestres y del estado de instalacion de las fuerzas y de guardia avanzada de la unidad mirando hacia el territorio surcoreano, de donde viene el nubarron de guerra debido a los ejercicios militares "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y otros preparativos de nueva guerra agresiva de los enemigos.
					
					El presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de una guia en fortalecer por todos los medios la combatividad de la unidad y fortificar toda la zona de defensa como una muralla de acero frente a las maniobras provocativas de los enemigos.
					
					Siguio inspeccionado el batallon adscrito a la unidad 493 del EPC en el frente avanzado.
					
					El Comandante Supremo subio al puesto de observacion del batallon de artilleria de costa adscrito a la unidad, donde entendio del estado de guardia avanzada observando la isla Paekryong a corta distancia.
					
					Pregunto si no hay cambio en la situacion del enemigo y como fueron instalados los equipos tacticos y fuerzas de combate.
					
					Senalo la necesidad de elevar mas en el futuro la densidad de fuego y rectificar y enmendar de continuo el proyecto sobre la asignacion de la mision de fuego y la utilizacion de equipos conforme a la demanda de la guerra contemporanea y el cambiante estado de disposicion de los enemigos.
					
					Dirigio los ejercicios de manejo de canones de los soldados de la primera posicion de la segunda compania del batallon.
					
					El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea inspecciono el batallon adscrito a la unidad 641 del EPC en la primera linea de frente.
					
					Dio como recuerdos los binoculos, fusil automatico y ametralladora a los militares del batallon y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Presto atencion profunda a la labor y la vida de los militares recorriendo la sala de educacion, dormitorio, comedor y otras instalaciones culturales e intendencia.
					
					Dijo que dicha zona es la zona candente donde puede estallarse la guerra en cualesquier momento por las imprudentes provocaciones agresivas de los enemigos y destaco que el batallon asestara un fuerte golpe de represalia a los enemigos si estos se atreven a agredir aunque sea 0.001mm del mar de la patria donde se ejerce la soberania de la RPDC al mantener el estado de la maxima alerta de acuerdo con la situacion muy delicada.
					
					El comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un fue acompanado por los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong y Pak Jae Gyong, el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Hwang Pyong So, el coronel general del EPC Kim Chun Sam y los miembros de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC.

articles.title: A Kim Jong Il dedica presente una personalidad vietnamita
articles.content:
A Kim Jong Il dedica presente una personalidad vietnamita
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, al Dirigente Kim Jong Il le rindio presente el poeta Nguyen Sy Thiet, quien vive en la ciudad Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam.
					Regalo fue entregado el dia 18 a un funcionario de la embajada coreana en Vietnam.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia disparates de Ryu U Ik
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia disparates de Ryu U Ik
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- El ministro surcoreano de Reunificacion, Ryu U Ik, dijo hace unos dias que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea "calumnia de modo sostenido" al Sur de Corea, insistiendo en que ella "proceda cuanto antes al dialogo", "pare inmediatamente sus acciones erroneas" y "se ponga a resolver el problema de familiares separados" 
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual del dia 26, refuto los dichos de Ryu con los siguientes argumentos: 
					
					Los temas referidos por el traidor Ryu estan indicados ya en la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, aprobada y publicada hace 40 anos por ambas partes coreanas como programa comun de la nacion por la reunificacion. 
					
					Gracias a los constantes esfuerzos sinceros de la parte Norte, tuvo lugar la cumbre intercoreana en Pyongyang en que se publico la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Despues, ambas partes coreanas vinieron desarrollando rapido las relaciones bilaterales mediante el dialogo y negociaciones segun el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					En particular, aun despues de que aparecio en el Sur de Corea el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak, la RPDC se mantuvo muy paciente para seguir mejorando las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos negaron totalmente el dialogo disparateando que "no accederian al dialogo dejandose llevar por el Norte" y "estan dispuestos a dejar en congelacion las relaciones Sur-Norte hasta el final de mandato".
					
					Dejaron en suspension la cooperacion y el intercambio y hasta las labores humanitarias entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Para colmo, realizaron los ejercicios de tiro instalando las consignas y blancos que ofendieron la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, y a la larga, hirieron doblemente a los connacionales del Norte en gran duelo nacional. 
					
					Ryu U Ik debe estudiar mas las relaciones intercoreanas, reconocer con sinceridad sus crimenes y pedir perdon ante la nacion. 
					
					Si sigue actuando como ahora como lacayo de Lee Myung Bak, cadaver vivo, sera condenado a duras penas junto con su superior.

articles.title: EE.UU. y Sur de Corea deben actuar con prudencia
articles.content:
EE.UU. y Sur de Corea deben actuar con prudencia
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ACNC) -- Pese a la fuerte protesta y condena del interior y exterior del pais, Estados Unidos y los titeres del Sur de Corea iniciaron los ejercicios conjuntos militares "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					Cientos de miles de efectivos y equipos de guerra nuclear entraron en un estado de guerra, debido a lo cual, en la Peninsula Coreana creo la mas aguda tension militar.
					
					Los presentes simulacros son diferentes de anteriores desarrollados so pretexto de "ejercicios anuales".
					
					Se despliegan apuntando a la RPDC que esta en periodo del gran duelo nacional por la perdida del gran padre de la nacion quien dedico todo lo suyo para la unidad de todos los coreanos y la reintegracion territorial, razon por la cual nuestro ejercito y pueblo redoblan sus indignaciones.
					
					Los presentes entrenamientos constituyen una violacion nunca perdonable a la soberania y la dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los belicistas interior y exterior del pais no conocen demasiado de su contraparte.
					
					Todavia hablan de una "provocacion" de alguien para justificar sus actos belicos, pero no podran  enganar a nadie.
					
					El mundo ve claramente quien es el provocador.
					
					El fautor es EE.UU. que con el plan de guerra de agresion al Norte desarrolla los ejercicios militares en el Sur de Corea y sus contornos movilizando a sus titeres.
					
					EE.UU. es el destructor de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y el promotor de la exacerbacion de la situacion.
					
					Ya que el imperio inicio por fin los ejercicios de guerra de ensayo nuclear, guerra de agresion a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas belicosas surcoreanas, nadie puede prever la futura situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, incontrolable hasta la fecha.
					
					Si se desencadena la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, esto dara influencia negativa a la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak deben darse clara cuenta de las consecuencias que emanen de sus imprudentes provocaciones militares.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo estan totalmente dispuestos a enfrentarse con los yanquis y titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Si ellos actuan imprudentemente equivocando nuestra voluntad de defensa de la paz, se quemaran por el fuego encendido por si mismos.
